welcomeMessage: Welcome to HMT Groupe, your trusted partner in textile machinery solutions.
highQualityMachinery: Import and export of high-quality textile machinery
tailoredSolutions: Tailored solutions for diverse manufacturing needs
dedicatedManufacturing: Dedicated to enhancing your textile manufacturing processes

machinesSales.title: Machines Sales
machinesSales.description: Discover our range of high-quality machines for various textile manufacturing needs. We assist you in selecting the right equipment for your business and ensure timely delivery to your location.

embroiderySolutions.title: Embroidery Solutions
embroiderySolutions.description: We offer expert guidance on selecting and using embroidery machines. Enhance your textile products with our professional advice and support.

manufacturingSolutions.title: Manufacturing Solutions
manufacturingSolutions.description: Receive comprehensive support for various aspects of textile manufacturing. Our team provides tailored solutions to optimize your production processes and improve efficiency.

equipment.heading: Industrial Equipment & Machines for Textiles and Apparel
equipment.description: Explore our extensive range of textile equipment, meticulously designed to cater to all your needs in crafting, comfort, and style. We take pride in offering diverse categories, each reflecting our unwavering commitment to quality and innovation.

categories.label: WASHING, DYEING, DRYING, AND FINISHING EQUIPMENT

categories.washingDyeingDryingFinishing: Washing, Dyeing, Drying, and Finishing Equipment

hero.subtitle: Exceptional Craftsmanship Meets Innovation
hero.title: Master the Art of Embroidery Machines

advantages.title: After-Sales Service
advantages.description: The after-sales service is provided by our technicians.

advantages.title: Stock
advantages.description: A stock of machines and spare parts available in our warehouse.

advantages.title: Warranty
advantages.description: Machines are original, new, and come with a 12-month warranty for any manufacturing defects.

advantages.title: Expert Advice
advantages.description: Have a question? Send us your request by email or phone.

featuredProducts.title: See What's New!
featuredProducts.description: Discover the Cutting-Edge Trends in Embroidery Technology!

contactSection.heading: Contact Us
contactSection.text: Have questions or need help with an order? Reach out to us!

curved_collection: Curved Collection for Your Bedroom Get 25% Off
